title: Jessica Biel talks keeping up with husband Justin Timberlake on the dance floor: 'You just give up'
text:
Jessica Biel opened up about her life with husband Justine Timberlake during an appearance on The Ellen DeGeneres Show that airs Wednesday, October 16.

The Sinner star chats about clubbing until 3 a.m. with the SexyBack singer, in Paris, and what it's like to hit the dance floor next to him.

Being the proud mother of a 4-year-old, she also dishes about how her boy Silas is now telling his own jokes, as well as her Facebook Watch drama series Limestone.

LIfe with Justin: Jessica Biel, 37, dished on a number of subjects, including what it's like to dance at a club next to husband Justin Timberlake, during an appearance on The Ellen DeGeneres Show that airs Wednesday, October 16

The friendly sit-down started with Ellen probing her guest about her recent trip to Paris.

Biel shared about how they went to the Louis Vuitton Fashion Show and then followed that up by going out dancing at a club, which she said rarely ever happens now that they're parents.

'We really went for it,' she said.

'We stayed out dancing until literally 3 a.m. -- I think we forgot that we are in our late thirties and we thought we were in our early twenties or something.'

European holiday: The Sinner actress first shared about how she and her husband went to the Louis Vuitton Fashion Show in Paris and then followed that up by going out dancing at a club

With a big and inquisitive smile on her face, Ellen asked what it was like for everybody to be dancing next to Justin Timberlake.

'Do they just kind of give up and move away?' she said.

'Yea, yea, you just give up and move away and sort of admire. Or you just kind of throw out your best moves and see what sticks,' Biel explained with admiration of her man's dancing skills.

With a big and inquisitive smile on her face, Ellen asked what it was like for everybody to be dancing next to Justin Timberlake

The Minnesota native also chatted to Ellen about how she and her husband also visited Scotland and Switzerland during their European holiday so that Justin could play in a couple of golf tournaments.

Ellen pointed out that Justin is a really good golfer and that 'he could really go pro.'

'He really could be,' Biel responded. 'He's just so dedicated and naturally talented in that sport.'

Her take: 'You just give up and move away and sort of admire. Or you just kind of throw out your best moves and see what sticks,' Biel said about what it's like to dance next to her husband; the couple are pictured at the Louis Vuitton Fashion Show in Paris, France October 1, 2019

Biel also shared about how her 4-year-old son, Silas, is now telling his own jokes and that he actually gets the jokes, which she revealed is 'terrifying' for her.

The actress discussed her Facebook Watch drama series Limestone, and then bonded over their love for dark shows and films.

Later in the show, Ellen and her resident DJ tWitch played a game of Guesstures against Biel and viral star Kalen Allen.
description: Jessica Biel gave Ellen DeGeneres the lowdown on what's its like to hit the dance floor at a club with husband Justin Timberlake: 'You just give up... or throw out your best moves.'
